Parameters: Whether or not to show a "connecting" popup at the beginning of the sign-in flow. Default behavior is for this to be true.
setShowConnectingPopup(boolean).Description: Sets whether a "connecting" popup should be displayed automatically at the start of the sign-in flow. By default this is enabled. Note that this call will use the default gravity for the "connecting" popup, which will display the popup at the center of the screen. If you prefer that the popup appear in a different section of the screen, you can use @B_com#google#android#gms#games#Games#GamesOptions#Builder#setShowConnectingPopup_E@, and provide a Gravity value.

Parameters: Whether or not to show a "connecting" popup at the beginning of the sign-in flow. Default behavior is for this to be true.
The @B_android#view#Gravity_E@ which controls where the "connecting" popup should be displayed during sign-in.
setShowConnectingPopup(boolean, int).Description: Sets whether a "connecting" popup should be displayed automatically at the start of the sign-in flow. By default this is enabled.
setShowConnectingPopup(boolean, int).FullName: public Games.GamesOptions.Builder setShowConnectingPopup (boolean showConnectingPopup, int gravity)
